name: Tartarus (itch) (Rainier Dancel)
description:
Here is the short tutorial of one of my upcoming game Tartarus

a small tease I made a while back. Levels may become really easy at most times and the BGM is something from one of my favourite Classic-Schubert

-Left mouse button to confirm next scene

-F to interact

-arrow keys

Introduction:

where all Puzzles are locked away what once was lost will always be discovered, while inside Tartarus feel free to explore different results of your actions and hopefully find your way out of this world of Labyrinth
